page.title: 12CHILDREN'S WEEKENDS.
page.content: {Friday.}1.When I get home, I get changed and if I have any homework to do, I do that first. If I have any spare time, I watch TV or listen to my radio. After tea, I go to my guitar lesson at half past five for half an hour. Sometimes I play with my brother until 7 o'clock, then I watch TV until 10 o'clock when I get ready for bed. I read until 11 o'clock and then go to sleep. 2. When I get home, I get changed and watch TV until tea-time. After tea, me and my brother get ready for choir practice at church. The choirmaster tells us whether there is a wedding on Saturday. If there is, when we go we get Â£1. Then we practice the hymns for Sunday. After choir practice,we are so tired, we go to bed when we get home.
